summary: This mods retexture the nightingale armor (male only).
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma]       [color=#980000]                                    [size=6][u]NIGHTINGALE ARMOR[/u] RETEXTURE

[/size][/color][/font][size=5][color=#e06666]DESCRIPTION:[/color]

[/size]This mod adds a retexture for the male nightingale armor.

[size=5][color=#f6b26b]INSTALATION:[/color]

[/size]Just drag the file into your skyrim data folder and replace it.

[size=5][color=#900000]COMPATIBILITY:[/color]

[/size]This mod is a retexture , so is compatible with all mods except other retextures of the same armor.
[color=#bf9000]
[/color][size=5][color=#bf9000]THANKS TO:[/color]

[/size]Me and Nailyn , for create the retexture.

Bethesda ,  for create the game.

Gimp.

Creation Kit.
author: Evildark and Nailyn
